# init(url:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an audio node from an audio asset with the specified URL.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(url: URL)
```

```swift
convenience init(url: URL)
```

## Parameters

- **url**: The URL of an audio file.

## Return Value

A newly initialized audio node.

## Initializing Audio Nodes

- **init(avAudioNode:)**: Initializes an audio node from an AVFoundation audio node.
- **init(fileNamed:)**: Initializes an audio node from an audio asset with the specified filename.
- **init(coder:)**: Tells you when to initialize an audio node that has been unarchived.
